name: reporting
description: This project generates reports on progress in terms of work done on the SAEON-Atlas repository by interacting with the Github API

scripts.start: rimraf .build && nodemon --watch ./src --exec 'prettier --write "src/**/*.@(js|json|graphql)" && babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir .build && copyfiles .env .build/ && NODE_ENV=development TZ=utc node .build'
scripts.start:prod: rimraf .build && babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir .build && copyfiles .env .build/ && NODE_ENV=production TZ=utc node .build

author: zach@saeon.ac.za
